title: The Schrift - Ancient Jewish Wisdom for Modern Times
description:
It is time that we see philosophy as something rebellious and therapeutic rather than boring and esoteric.
Using humor, personal anecdotes, and much hubris, the Schrift provides fresh and unexpected answers to life's most tricky and fateful questions.
The anchor of the Schrift is the weekly reading of the Torah. These passages are analyzed not as religious dogma but as brilliant pieces of literature and anthropology which bring ancient wisdom back into our lives. 
The greatest philosophers and writers of the German canon also weigh in on these questions during the Schrift. 
Finally the lectures incorporate Buddhist teachings and the practice of Yoga to bring together East and West, body and mind, eternity and the moment.
And the Schrift will always give you a "life tip" to carry with you along the way.

title: The Civic Podcast
description:
Hello everyone,

This podcast is a space to discuss, debate and dialogue about important matters that our society is facing. The goal is to keep it civil, keep it respectful and keep it tolerant. Common understanding and the exchange of ideas is the only way forward where critical thinking can prevail in this chaotic world we live in. 

Various topics will be covered, from society to the economy, from culture to religion, from art to technology. Every single aspect, factor and fact has an effect on the way we think and the way we act. A multidisciplinary approach needs to be taken when speaking about important topics that have an impact on policy, culture and our current socio-economic structures. 

I hope that throughout the podcast people will learn and listen to other points of view, but more importantly that the listeners think by themselves and come up with their own conclusions about was is just and fair. I really do believe that good information and intentions can bring out the best in people, let's make that a reality and revolutionise the way we think, act, discuss and interact with each other.

title: The Late to Church Podcast
description:
Are you a Catholic/Christian who struggles to feel the same connection to God that your fellow churchgoers describe? Do you struggle to find consistency in prayer and religious life? Do you feel like something's missing when it comes to religion and a relationship with God? The Late to Church Podcast is here to let you know that it's OK. We've been there. We've struggled with everything from literally being 10 minutes late to church every week, to being so far away from God that we're on the brink of totally giving up. We want to help you see the beauty in your struggle, and remind you that God's love for you surpasses any challenges. 

This podcast won't get too theological, but it will compel you to try and see your life through God's eyes. If you're looking for a frank conversation about the practical battles and beauty found in a relationship with Jesus, please join us as we do our best to "step out of the boat."

title: Budoucnost divadla
description: Když se nemůže divadlo hrát, nabízí tento unikátní odstup alespoň možnost divadlo reflektovat. V mnoha textech a rozhovorech o budoucnosti divadla se mluví o takzvané třetí divadelní reformě. Pojem navazuje na myšlení Kazimierze Brauna, který za první divadelní reformu označoval proměnu divadla na přelomu 19. a 20. století a za druhou dění spjaté s kontrakulturním hnutím šedesátých let. Jaký by měl být charakter třetí divadelní reformy – dnes, v časech, kdy pandemie koronaviru naplnila vizi Heinera Müllera, jenž vybízel divadla na rok zavřít, abychom pochopili jejich hodnotu? Dá se začít tam, kde jsme skončili? Jaké jsou nejzajímavější koncepty a nástroje, kterými můžeme začít revizi divadla? A je divadlo ve svém posledním tažení, nebo se naopak může stát po filmu, který ovládl 20. století, vůdčím druhem umění pro svoji neredukovatelnost do online prostoru? Co jsou otázky divadla budoucnosti? A proč divadlo potřebujeme? Kolektiv HaDivadla vytvořil tento podcast ve snaze sdílet rozhovory o budoucnosti divadla s lidmi, s nimiž se rádi o divadle bavíme. Příjemný poslech! — www.hadivadlo.cz

title: Plato's Pod: Dialogues on the works of Plato
description: Welcome to Plato's Pod, a bi-weekly podcast of group discussions on the dialogues of Plato held through Meetup.com. Anyone interested in participating, whether to learn about Plato or to contribute to the dialogue, is welcome to join with no experience required! The podcast is hosted by amateur philosopher James Myers and inquiries can be e-mailed to dialoguesonplato@outlook.com. Wherever we go in our discussions we gain knowledge from each other’s perspectives, and for the increase in knowledge we invite everyone to add their voice to the dialogue. Plato, without a doubt, would have imagined no better way than in dialogue for knowledge – the account of the reasons why – to find its home.

title: The In-Between Project

To be in-between means to embrace the multiplicity and contradictions of one’s identity. To exist between homelands, both literal and metaphorical. Join us as we explore what a future looks like with more people who are neither nor, who belong in the in-between.

We will be sharing our personal experiences and thoughts about anything in this world that needs to be changed for the better. We hope that we can educate ourselves as well as all of you along the ride and aim to impact everyone in a positive way! Contact us: embracingchangepodcast@gmail.com

title: Kindness Rebellion
description: Rebellions are categorized by a rejection and opposition to oppressive authority. Historically and traditionally rebellions have required brute force and savagery, the same tools utilized by the oppressors in question. Perhaps it is possible to reject oppression through kindness instead and perhaps this can only be done through a shared understanding of what it means to exist. In this podcast I intend to reject our modern day oppressors by communicating with as many people as I can in order to develop an understanding of all view points in order to unify humanity towards a common goal. Join me as we explore the wonders of infinite consciousness and develop meaningful relationships along the way.

description:

We are students of intelligent investing (we don’t think you ever graduate, do you?), practicing in the skill of value and the art of behavioural, hedged by the protection of macro.

To enjoy this podcast: You don’t need a mathematics degree. You don’t need to be an economics master. You don’t need to be a fund manager. 

You just need to be: Open to thinking differently. Curious to explore that difference. And financially literate to profit from it.

“It is impossible to begin to learn that which one thinks one already knows.” - Epictetus

title: Dharma Things Podcast
description:
Life is full of obstacles, misconceptions, misguided ideas, and on the flipside amazing teachings and practices to balance it all out. The Dharma Things podcast gives people with experiences and explanations on life a voice, and pushes us to realise we are all often of the same thinking and experience. Sometimes unthought of perspectives, sometimes unaccepted ideas. It's all in there.

My name is Miz DeShannon, and in curating the podcast I'll be gathering many conversations with people I respect and admire. People from different backgrounds, ethnicities, genders, whose stories and experiences cross similar subjects; ancestry, belonging, discovery, self-development.

The common thread though – Dharma. My hope is that in these sessions you can find some guidance towards your Dharma, some refuge, or respite, knowledge, or pure joy….

title: The Sun, The Moon & The TRUTH
description:
Welcome to The Sun, The Moon & The TRUTH podcast, a series of in-depth conversations that create space for messy, playful and challenging conversations about yoga and life and the places where the two meet. 

Join us (Karina Guthrie and Natalie Backman, yogini’s and yoga teacher trainers) in our quest to understand yoga's role in uncovering the universal truths woven into the fabric of tradition, society and culture.

Speaking to well-rounded guests from the yoga community, we pull back the veil on eye-opening issues that exist in the yoga industry today. 

In these vulnerable and thought-provoking conversations, you’ll learn what inspired us to begin practicing and why we choose to devote ourselves to the practice everyday by living these teachings from the inside-out.

If you’re looking for a podcast that is spiritual and insightful whilst remaining empowering and inspiring, you’ll want to add this to your list!

title: Jaké chceš Česko
description: Máme rádi Česko a lidi v něm. Rádi se bavíme a diskutujeme s těmi, kteří spolu s námi tvoří a dělají Česko krásnějším. Je jich tu spousta a jsou vlídní, jsou milí, přistupují k druhým a k sobě s respektem. Radují se, i když to neumí stále, tak se po většinu času radují. A s těmi, kteří tvoří a kteří jsou OPRAVDOVÝMI TVŮRCI tady mluvíme, diskutujeme, hledáme hodnoty, které jsou podstatné jako respekt, soucit, VLÍDNOST, pochopení, slušnost. A o tom vždy mluvíme, ne vždy naplno, ale jsou tam. Ve slovech našich hostů jsou slyšet. Pokud je chcete s námi hledat. Být spontánní. Něco se přiučit. Přidat se k nám, tak jste vítáni. V komentářích, v podnětech a v tvorbě. Tak můžeme vytvořit prostředí, které bude založené na vzájemné spolupráci. Pokud byste měli zájem nás podpořit, tak nám uděláte radost, když si nakoupíte čokolády nebo knihu moderátora Petra Kovaříka na https://eshop.prazskacokolada.cz/, protože bez podpory čokoládovny by toto nevzniklo. #jakechcescesko ? #mluvimeotom

title: Into Your Mind
description:
Welcome to "Into Your Mind," the immersive podcast experience hosted by hypnotherapist and filmmaker Elena Mosaner. In each episode, Elena shares her expertise and personal anecdotes as she takes you on a captivating journey into the realm of hypnosis and personal development.

For the first ten minutes, Elena dives into various topics surrounding hypnosis, drawing from her own experiences and exploring the science, studies, and recent research behind this powerful practice. She delves into her experiences being a hypnotist coach with close to 20 years of experience helping transform their lives and she unveils the fascinating workings of the mind.

Halfway through as the episode unfolds, Elena slowly guides you into a state of deep relaxation and receptivity. Through her soothing voice and carefully crafted suggestions, she leads you into a state of hypnosis, where you can tap into the transformative power of your subconscious mind. Each episode focuses on a different topic, such as sleep, habit-building, confidence, healing, clarity, focus and more.

"Into Your Mind" is an immersive experience designed to empower and inspire personal growth. It's the perfect listen for those seeking to expand their understanding of themselves and unlock their full potential. Whether you're familiar with Hypnosis, Spiral Dynamics, integral theory, metamodernism, or the concepts multiperspectivity and developmental stages, this podcast is tailored to individuals who value personal development and are eager to explore the depths of their own minds.

Join Elena Mosaner on this extraordinary journey of self-discovery and transformation. Open yourself to new possibilities, embrace the power of your mind, and embark on a path of personal growth with "Into Your Mind."

Elena Mosaner is a founder of Hypnocloud, digital hypnotherapy app. Download it here: www.hypnocloud.com

Follow Elena at www.instagram.com/hypno.cloud

title: The Unplugged Debate
description:
Welcome to The Unplugged Debate, on this podcast we delve into the ideas that surround human’s interaction with both nature and technology.
Talking to people about their time in the outdoors. Starting from when they were younger all the way through to present day.
Developing a picture on who and what motivates them to be outside and why they do the things they do in the outdoors. Crossing over into talking about their technology usage and how that has changed throughout their life. 
Speaking to them about the different types of technology they use on a day to day basis from their mobile phones to the running shoes.
Once we’ve developed a good picture of them, we incorporate that into how they think technology has changed their outlook on life and their time in the outdoors and how they think technological develop has changed society on a wider scale.

title: MENTALITY MATTERZ
description: MENTALITY MATTERZ? Life is a bunch of obstacles. You fall, fail, or perhaps think about giving up; However, how do you respond? When you have a million thoughts flowing throughout your head. This is where our character is built, and the tough times are what help define us as a person. So I decided to create this podcast M.M, MENTALITY MATTERS, where I will talk about daily problems, mental health awareness, ways to succeed, coming from the bottom, the different obstacles we all go through, and what is the best way to overcome these problems. Having total control of your emotions in any situation is how you best can protect your peace & your making sure you will always win. I'm not here to talk about what I think is correct but to help understand the best way to go about life's obstacles so we are not stuck in the same situation and constantly elevating.

title: The Jude Show
description:
The self healing journey is always difficult when you don't know where to start. 
In my show I discuss a wide range of topics that could serve you in your self-improvement and growth journey that I personally had to go through. With each episode dedicated to a special part of you that needs a deeper look. The main key is to have the willingness to change and be open to the many perspectives this world can offer. All my hopes are that you are left with a lingering thought that could alter the way you think towards the future.
Just know that, I am not here to offer you solutions to your problems, I am just here to show you how I solved mine.  

Follow me on Instagram @thejudeshow

Wie Alt- und Neu-Brandenburger*innen das gemeinsam schaffen, welche Unterstützung es dabei gibt, was Unternehmen tun können, um internationale Fachkräfte zu binden und wie sich Institutionen interkulturell öffnen, um die Arbeitsmarktintegration von Menschen mit Migrationsgeschichte zu verbessern – all das möchten wir in diesem Podcast zeigen. 
Dabei begleiten wir Projekte, die daran arbeiten, den Zugang zum deutschen Arbeitsmarkt für alle fair zu gestalten. Für ein offenes und vielfältiges Brandenburg

description:
The Unbeatable podcast is all about helping you keep going when you want to give up. Get inspiration and encouragement from people who have been there, and avoid getting stuck in defeat and worry. We say, “When life becomes unmerciful...be unbeatable!”

 
Jeff Struecker is a member of the US Army Ranger Hall of Fame. He served most of his military career with the Army Rangers and won the Best Ranger Competition as a Sergeant. In almost 23 years in the Army, Jeff served 17 combat deployments in 5 different US wars including Black Hawk Down. He holds a PhD, as well as many other earned and honorary degrees. He has taught leadership at every level from undergraduate to PhD. He is an award-winning author with six books in print. His military thrillers and life story are in constant demand.

title: Fullerton Uncovered
description: A stolen toilet seat from the school restroom ignited the movement I created with this podcast to confront and resolve morbid conditions that students in my county are subjected to. Decaying conditions, inability to comply with federal laws regarding menstrual products, and the lack of administrative efforts to listen to student demands was what it took for my friend and I to take a stand and create a podcast which provided avenues for students to solve this issue, and resulted in administrators listening to student demands and complying with the students. We wanted to do this to give a voice to students, and we were able to go to the school district with this movement and convince them to do what students had been wanting changed for years. Something interesting about our show is that although our town and county is small, after publishing our podcast, our channel saw an 84.62% increase in subscribers to the channel because that is how passionate students were regarding this topic. What I loved the most about this whole podcast was the journey, because it took us months to do research into the inequitable laws that our district was violating, dig into old articles ranging years which provided evidence for our points, and go around to multiple schools to take interviews to showcase the range of students and their opinions regarding the bathrooms.

title: Bioethics in the Margins
description:
Who we are: We are a collaborative of bioethics scholars interested in creating a more inclusive space to explore topics relevant to bioethics and the medical humanities while advancing equity and social change/restitution. Although we found our shared interests through our membership in the American Society for Bioethics and Humanities Race Affinity Group, we are independent of ASBH and any other organization. The views expressed in this podcast are our own and the speakers and do not represent our employers, institutions, or professional societies.

Mission: Bioethics in the Margins aims to include topics, guests and audiences who are not always highlighted in mainstream bioethics discourse. We will focus on structural inequity and the role bioethics can play in social change. We aim to move beyond traditional bioethics frameworks and intentionally draw on intersectionality, social justice, racial justice, disability ethics, women, LGBTQ ethics, and topics specific to Black, immigrant/refugee, Native American, Latinx populations. 

Hosts:  Kirk Johnson, Amelia Barwise

Team Members:

Isabel Bolo, Liz Chuang, Wendy Jiang, Nicolle Strand

title: Nlp Elämässä
description:
Nlp on hyvinvointia, tasapainoa ja itsetuntemusta lisäävä onnistumisen, tietoisuuden ja elämän merkityksellisyyden lisäämisen väline jonka avulla voi tarkastella omaa elämäänsä. Sitä mikä on mennyttä, tätä päivää ja minkälaista tulevaisuutta haluaa itselleen rakentaa.  Se antaa mahdollisuuden saavuttaa oman elämän toiveet ja unelmat. Nlp voi olla tukenasi elämän muutostilanteissa, kun haluat päästää jostain vanhasta irti tai haluat elämääsi jotain uutta. Usein kysynkin että mitä se on mitä haluat elämääsi juuri nyt? Ja siitä se sitten alkaa.  

Tässä podcastissa Reetta juttelee eri ikäisten ja eri ammateissa olevien oppilaidensa kanssa kanssa Nlp:stä ja siitä miten he ovat kokeneet koulutukset, mitä hyötyä siitä on heille ollut ja mitä hyvää se on tuonut heidän elämäänsä niin henkilökohtaisesti, kuin omalla uralla. 

Näiden tarinoiden kautta voit kuulla miten Nlp ihan konkreettisesti toimii erilaisten ihmisten arjessa. Keskusteluissa sivutaan Nlp harjoituksia ja aiheita jotka ovat olleet heille merkityksellisiä. Näiden keskusteluiden pohjalta ja ihmisten kiinnostuksesta riippuen Nlp Elämässä jaksoissa tulee pian myös harjoituksia, rentoutuksia, informaatioita ja teoriaa. 

Laita viestiä mistä haluaisit kuulla lisää? reetta@vanhanenreetta.  

Nlp tulee sanoista Neuro, joka viittaa ajatteluun, Linguistic, joka viittaa puhuttuun kieleen, sen rakenteisiin ja sisäiseen puheeseen, Programming viittaa käyttäytymiseen. Nlp tekniikoilla voidaan päästä käsiksi niihin asioihin ja käyttäytymiseen johon toivot muutosta tai siihen mitä haluat vahvistaa entisestään. Pääosin Nlp:n tarkoitus on antaa ihmisille lisää taitoja joilla hän itse yhä enemmän on oman elämänsä ohjaksissa ja voi elää täydesti oman näköistä ja oloista elämää, sekä menestyä omalla urallaan entistä paremmin. 

Senior Nlp-Kouluttaja, Global Nlp Master Trainer, Generative Coach ja Skeema terapeutti Reetta Vanhasella on 20 vuoden kokemus nlp:stä ja sen kouluttamisesta. Hän on ohjannut yli 60 pitkää Nlp-koulutusta ja tuhansia ihmisiä omissa koulutusryhmissään (Nlp Practitioner, Nlp Master Practitioner, Nlp Trainer, Nlp Coach, Nlp Trainer Extra) ja yrityksille räätälöidyissä valmennuksissa, kuin omien coaching asiakkaiden kanssa. 

Reetan www-sivut: www.vanhanenreetta.fi
Reetan löydät myös 
FB: Reetta Vanhanen Oy - Koulutus, Coaching, NLP, Generative Change @reettakouluttaa
Insta: reettavanhanen_nlp
LinkedIn: Reetta Vanhanen 

Suomessa toimii Suomen Nlp-yhdistys, jonka hallituksessa Reetta toimi 2005-2013 joista puheenjohtajana 7 vuotta.  
Yhdistys on perustettu 1990 ja sen ydintehtävä on lisätä Nlp-tietoisuutta Suomessa.

title: Philosophy Gets Personal

Our host, Dr. Ferrarello received her PhD in philosophy from the Sorbonne University in Paris. She is an expert in Phenomenology, Ethics, Moral Psychology and, Ancient and Contemporary Philosophy. Dr. Ferrarello is currently a professor of philosophy at California State University East Bay, and also a philosophical counselor. Follow our social media accounts for episode updates, highlights and other behind the scenes material.

title: It's All My Fault
description:
Hello universe!

How's it going?

Ok. Ok! I get it. Dumb question.

At least on v.867-5309 Earth it is. This updated timeline we're all running now is a legitimate flustercuck. Wherever one cares to look, things are getting worse. And the worst part of all?

This mess we're all snared in with its momentous culminations at this precise point in time?

Well, that's mostly on me for failing to recognize long ago that living my life with the purpose and destiny I intended when I manifested here wasn't a choice for only my amusement.

Nope. Not. Even. Close.

As it turns out, my destiny has almost nothing to do with my own life experiences and everything to do with how much help I can offer you.

And offer to you, and to you too.

And to these ladies on my left, as well as those two guys right there and to all of those kids playing up there. As well as any other homo sapien sapiens who are here needing my help.

Whether you're an eternal soul tapping into the infinite source's wisdom, or an interplanetary interloper investigating intriguing incidents involving impossible internal incisions, or an arch-angel of biblical lore (fallen or ascending, no judgement here), or a Lemurian light-being, a Pleiadean/Annunaki hybrid starseed. You might even be a silver surfer on acid teaching taekwondo in Tahiti.

Totally.

All are welcome.

Even you. Yes you. You who wrongly thinks you're nothing but a 21st century homo sapien sapien living a pointless life here on Earth v.867-5309. A life that you hope ends peacefully as you sleep.

You might have been born in Ogunquit, Maine but are now living with your Aunt Sandy in Keene, New Hampshire so you can save money while working part time at a car wash in Brattleboro, Vermont, all of which allows you to finish up your MBA at the university in Framingham, Massachusetts.

Could that be you? Manifesting now with me here? Collectively experiencing these collapsing particles riding out their wave potentials to destinations as of now, undetermined?

Because your participation and specific contribution on this timeline is what starts turning this thing around. In fact much of what's broken now will only get worse if you don't rise up to fulfill your life's unique purpose.

Yes. You.

Given the situation, I can't escape one basic thought:

"WtF is going wrong now?"

Usually followed by a:

"Just when you thought things couldn't get any worse..."

moment.

Which inevitably gives rise to thoughts like:

"If they'll take it to this level what won't they do?!??"

Unmoored by all the chaos, now the internal muttering starts up:

"I just don't know any more. I mean ... who's going to fix all this? ... and how? The one thing I do know is this kind of mess won't fix itself. We're gonna need some help around here. I think we might even be running out of time to do something about it... If I'm being totally honest."

Yeah, yeah, call me out for my late start on the project. I deserve it.

I admit that I should have gotten this going way before January 2, 2022. However, starting things at the last possible second is kind of my thing.

That said, when I do show up, I come prepared to work with concentrated purpose until the job's 100% completed.

Come join me if you are so inclined, but do so with at least a 1.5x uptick in playback speed. You'll thank me later for all the time saved.

I add to my nonsense daily, or at least I try to. If I'm absent for a day or two it's nothing to be concerned about. I likely broke another phone or fell victim to some other equally unglamorous event. I'll return sooner or later... probably later.

Much like yourself I still have some of life's crossroads left to navigate. Many lessons to learn. Many people to meet. In doing so, I promise not to forego any life rewards I've yet to experience!

And neither should you!

title: Start Where You Stand
description: SWYS is dedicated to you. It is dedicated to the individuals who have an abundance of ambition and untapped potential, simply in need of direction and a place to Start. This podcast is broken into two categories: Interviews and modern high performance research. We explore four inventories (Myers-Briggs, StrengthFinders, Enneagram, and 5 Love Languages) to establish a foundation of "Knowing Thyself" to lead thyself and through interview and research we analyze the 7 dimensions of optimal performance. Listeners will receive action items after each episode to implement the most nuance and effective habits, mantras, and routines in their own lives. It's never too late to "Start Where You Stand".

title: Nature of Mind Podcast
description:
The mind is your most valuable asset and our most dangerous possession. It can be amazingly creative or terrifyingly destructive. Every experience we have, or could possibly have, is mediated through the mind. The health of our mind is the health of our life. From a Buddhist point of view our greatest danger is not realising the potential of our mind, and not finding ways of living out that potential.

A season of events featuring prominent psychologists, neuroscientists, and meditators; including interactive seminars, meditation masterclasses, and retreats. From theory, to reflection, to practice: join us in exploring the Nature of Mind.

title: De qué podemos hablar?
description:
¿Qué sucede al sentarse en una mesa, prender un micrófono y revelar un tema sin preparación? Sucede el podcast más improvisado y a la vez más calculado en la historia del entretenimiento hablado. El programa más crudo pero más mesurado; el más banal pero más trascendental. Y la descripción más hiperbólica.

En este espacio buscamos expandir nuestro conocimiento y generar un ámbito de sana discusión y polémica alrededor de diversos temas de interés. Desde tópicos prácticos hasta debates filosóficos sobre las preguntas más fundamentales. Todos cubiertos con el mismo nivel de ingenuidad y afición.

title: East Durham Veterans Trust Podcast
description:
Welcome to the East Durham Veterans trust Podcast

In these episodes we will be talking about all things veteran related as well as as things mental health.  Enjoy

title: DemoPratiques : le podcast des pratiques démocratiques
description:
Nous sommes en démocratie. Mais qu’est-ce que la démocratie ? Et qui crée la démocratie ?

Plutôt que de considérer celle-ci comme un régime immuable, nous vous proposons d’aller à la rencontre de personnes qui travaillent, d’une manière ou d’une autre, pour augmenter la place politique des citoyens et citoyennes aujourd’hui. Ils inventent, construisent et réfléchissent à un régime “par le peuple, pour le peuple” Découvrez celles et ceux qui façonnent la démocratie aujourd’hui et ce qu’est la démocratie pour eux en écoutant les épisodes du podcast.

title: Apples & Oranges

title: Noccioline in Saletta
description:

Questo crew è nato da una ebbra fusione di producer, lyricist e cantanti di diverse zone di Milano (da Z4 a NoLo). Chosen1, Pantagruel, Da Sile, Tritarolo e Ronscio descrivono il loro vivere quotidiano in maniera romanzata, ma sottolineando le lo loro turbe e i problemi della società esprimendoli non solo attraverso la musica ma anche tramite diversi medium artistici visivi e audiovisivi.

title: Rogue Journal Club
description:
Journal clubs at colleges and universities are when academics get together to discuss research studies and commentary. Gina and Adrienne (podcast co-hosts) have gone rogue, doing journal club their way with informal commentary, full of wit, quips, and remarks on current research studies and commentary. The Rogue Journal Club features long-form discussions of peer-reviewed studies published in academic journals and their connections to society. 

The Rogue Journal Club is a ScioSophia production, Copyright 2022.     
Music from Uppbeat (free for Creators!), unique license code for each podcast episode per rules of Uppbeat.com

title: The Dig Bible Podcast
description: Welcome to The Dig Bible Podcast, do you have a curious mind? Often thought to yourself there has to be more to these stories in my Bible. Is knowing the “whys” important to you? Then you’ve found the right place! We are looking for those people that know there is more than what we’ve been taught. We are looking for those people that their beliefs that don’t “fit into the box”, and know that “For everyone who asks receives, and the one who seeks finds, and to the one who knocks it will be opened.” We believe that to truly understand the Bible we must put ourselves in the mindset of the writers, and to do that we must restore the “supernatural worldview” of the original audience to which they were writing to! So, with that being said don’t care to roll up your sleeves and get your hands dirty? LET’S DIG! Questions, comments, suggestions on future episode ideas we’d love to hear from you: thedig423@gmail.com. Join in on the conversations and exclusive content with our facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/thedig423/

title: La Eñe Enmarañada
description:
Las ideas son libres y la razón no lo es todo en esta vida. Nos rodea la vastedad de una naturaleza que se reinventa antes de que podamos seguirle la pista, aún así intentamos comprenderla, entenderla y reflexionar. La humanidad es la pequeña y sonora eñe en la maraña del universo. 
Acompaña a este par de ñoños que añoramos un mejor mañana mientras desgreñamos ideas venidas por igual de libros, películas, mitos, experiencias y demás.  Vamos a empequeñecernos ante el universo y todo lo que nos enseñe.

title: Leveled Heads
description: Welcome to Leveled Heads! Will and Derek deliver much needed insight to some wild stuff. We do hope you enjoy the informative content we have to offer. We do the work for you so all we need from you is to listen.  Please rate and review the show when possible and TELL ALL YOUR FRIENDS! Thanks for tuning in to Leveled Heads!

title: Speaking into the Void with Tyler W.
description: Welcome and Hello to the Void, where I put my voice out there with something that says "this is me, I am here". I also want this to just be another view of life; I want people to come out of each episode with an "upgraded" perspective, a perspective to help understand. There are so many things out there that can bring us the answers that we need or even the questions we have yet to ask ourselves. Now, I’m not an expert in many things and I won’t be an expert for many of the topics that I’ll cover on this podcast. I’m simply just a jack of all trades that hasn’t mastered his trades; a polymath; a generalist that seeks to give an added perspective to life. I do have knowledge to give but I also have a lot more to gain as well, however, this IS the Void where the random, weird and insightful hang out.

title: Diversity & Inclusion: Satisfying the tickbox?
description:
The podcast explores various topics under the umbrella of diversity & inclusion including neurodiversity, racial discrimination, mental health and more. On a monthly basis, 'Diversity & Inclusion: Satisfying the tickbox?' - Podcast aims to unveil personal stories and experiences on sensitive and delicate subjects, that one may face barriers to share with others, whilst there will also be a special emphasis on how DE&I impacts the workplace. This podcast is aimed for those who want to hear first-hand, sometimes unforeseen and surprising personal stories which will raise awareness, sometimes make you giggle and enable you to become a better ally. Everybody has their own story; everybody has their own journey.

description: “Let no corrupting talk come out of your mouths, but only such as is good for building up, as fits the occasion, that it may give grace to those who hear.” ~ Ephesians 4:29 A podcast in which I interview people from all over the world, to better discover cultures and the people behind it. Made to encourage more meaningful conversation.

title: The Awkward In-between
description:
What do you do when the beliefs that once gave you certainty no longer work? How do you cope when you have questions surrounding a popular idea, but don't feel safe to express them? Why is it that society seems more polarised than ever, and yet you don't feel comfortable with either extreme?

These questions and more drive the hosts of this podcast. Meet Dave Schenk and DAMIEN,  two individuals who are both on the long hard journey of questioning their once held certainties, as they are joined by a variety of guests who also find themselves in 'the awkward in-between'.

You can find & interact with us here:
https://www.facebook.com/awkwardinbetween 
https://twitter.com/awkwardib

title: Making Meaning
description:
Why are we here? What's the meaning of life? What's the meaning of your life?

Exploring these mysteries often results in more questions than you began with. So how do we move forward living meaningful lives? Making Meaning by The Cohere Collective explores this exact question.

Every other week, host Reese Brown interviews a new guest about how they have chosen to live their life in a meaningful way. We hope that through these stories you can explore how you have, and can, make meaning in your life.

Let's make meaning together. We are so glad you're here!

title: Goals - A New Perspective
description:
Goals!  Have you ever thought what if goals could be more interesting, opening to a new perspective and more deepening? Well, I embarked upon this journey of my writing  for a topic to write in 2022, and I wondered to myself how about goals! Different types of goals to life. 

In this series of podcast, join me in discovering 12 different types of goals to life. This series is all about going deeper into what goals are all about and how one can live by them.

Starting by gratitude goal and ending on spiritual goal, this series is going to be very interesting, raw, bold, beautiful and spoken straight from my heart.

So I hope you can connect to it.

Love,
Marisha C.

title: Where Art and Grief Meet
description:
Where Art & Grief Meet is an exploration of the space where the creative spirit mingles with grief, loss and adversity.

Sophia, a compulsive artist who has experienced her own fair share of adversity and grief, talks with a range of notable and passionate creatives (visual, writers, musicians, entrepreneurs) to reflect and share observations and responses to the question of how their art practice is impacted by the slings and arrows of a life, acknowledging of course that grief comes in an infinite number of shapes and forms: personal and global and everything in between. 

There is no hierarchy of grief here. Loss, in this context, is viewed as an inevitable part of life and a prism through which we explore artistic practice and expression. 
 
Sophia is interested in building a space where creatives can openly discuss their observations, their stories and the resulting strategies in order to alleviate isolation, make broader connections and create a supportive community. 


Website here https://www.sophandson.com/

title: Rivista Italiana di Teosofia
description: teosofica.org * RIT on FB * La storia della Società Teosofica Italiana è stata sempre accompagnata, fin dalla fine dell’Ottocento dalla pubblicazione di Riviste a carattere teosofico (Nova Lux, Bollettino della Società Teosofica Italiana, Gnosi, Alba Spirituale e altre) contenenti ad un tempo articoli e relazioni di approfondimento sulla Teosofia e informazioni sulle attività della Società teosofia Italiana e sulla S.T. a livello internazionale, che ha come riferimento il Quartier Generale di Adyar (Chennai, India). Dal 1974 la Rivista mensile della S.T.I. ha assunto la denominazione di “Rivista Italiana di Teosofia”, venendo pubblicata ininterrottamente e giungendo quindi, a maggio 2017, al 74esimo anno di edizione. La Rivista è diretta oggi dal dott. Antonio Girardi, Segretario Generale della S.T.I.

The Ambassador’s Forum is a Christian apologetics ministry that exists to “make God known, AS HE IS,” taken directly out of Scripture (1 John 3:2), and to equip believers with relevant, Biblically-based content that will help them feel confident in answering hard questions and defending their faith.

In this weekly podcast, we think deeply and biblically through a variety of questions and issues that Christians must grapple with in today's culture... often interviewing apologists and Christian thinkers from across the country who are on the front lines of the spiritual and cultural conflicts of the day.

title: Mickey is Dying
description: Medical professionals tell us that our friend Mickey is dying. (But he’s not sweating it.) This podcast is a conversation with Mickey as he candidly shares his journey with surprising positivity, thoughtful insights, and humor. Our goal is to help Mickey help all of us to learn about living while dying.

title: Ideaatikko
description:
Hei! Olen Anssi, itsetituleerattu ideaatikko. 

Olen 97-syntynyt englanninkielisissä nettikeskusteluissa pahasti marinoitunut zilleniaali. Kysyn kavereitani ja uusia tuttaviani mukaan vierailemaan tässä varsin strukturoimattomassa, uteliaisuus edellä -tyyppisessä podcastissa. Olen kiinnostunut filosofiasta, psykologiasta, neurotieteestä, biologiasta, uskonnosta, internetistä, politiikasta, ihmiskokemuksen moninaisuudesta yleisesti... 

Noh, siis uskon löytäväni jotain yhteistä puhuttavaa lähes kenen kanssa tahansa, ja harjoittelen tämän podcastin kautta ilmaisemaan tasapuolisesti varsin nyansseja näkemyksiäni. Haluan, että opimme jälleen ymmärtämään toisiamme poliittisesta varianssista huolimatta, kuitenkin yrittäen samalla yhdessä edistää tosien ja hyödyllisten käsitysten muodostumista ja leviämistä hegeliläisittäin. 

Ei pidetä kynsin hampain kiinni auttamattomasti vanhentuneesta, muttei myöskään hypätä sitä paetessa suoraa päätä ojasta allikkoon korulauseista päihtyneinä. Lähdetään luovimaan ja suunnistamaan eteenpäin valppaasti tietoisina ja rohkeina!

Matka on kuitenkin elämän pituinen. Ei siis oteta kaikkea liian tosissaan, sillä muuten palaa nopeasti loppuun. Tämän maailman absurdiuksille, joista ennen kaikkea itselle, on hyvä oppia nauramaan. Tervetuloa mukaan, arvoisa kollega, olethan sinäkin ideaatikko!

title: Kuddle With Kookie
description: In this podcast, I (an 18-year-old) talk about mental health, philosophical topics, stuff that could help us live life more happily, issues that we all face and more. The aim of the podcast is to spread love, make you feel less alone and share knowledge. I hope this podcast feels like a warm cuddle from Kookie (BTS, BT21 doll) or any of your loved ones :)

title: Gamers vs. The System
description: We are gamers. We've been confronting and solving problems head-on in digital worlds for decades. With this podcast we're standing up and giving the rallying cry all gamers can understand "HOW DO WE WIN?" We're all facing lots of issues in our lives, large and small, and our hope is to grow a solution-oriented community that wants to turn our gamer grit and determination towards a better future. We upload every Monday (or at least we will try to). Find us on most podcast platforms, Spotify, Apple, Google, etc. Send in your feedback to gvs.cast@gmail.com

title: Antifilosofia & Birras
description: Antifilosofía & Birras es un podcast conducido por Florencia Franco y Andrea Pomar que surge ante la necesidad posmoderna de "curarnos de la enfermedad filosófica" . En una época en la que un sinfín de expertos imparten respuestas, Flor y Andie buscarán recuperar las preguntas y generar de este modo un entretenido diálogo entre el discurso filosófico y el acto creativo. ¿Qué está sucediendo hoy en el terreno de los asuntos humanos? En cada episodio estas dos amigas buscarán tocar el nervio mismo de nuestro tiempo junto a un invitado especial.

title: VCE Philosophy Reading
description: Readings from the set texts in VCE Philosophy

title: What Crisis? Turning Mid-Life Crisis Into a Joyful, Balanced, Life Worth Living
description:
What Crisis? offers personal insight on living an intentional life for people who find themselves on a journey of growth in our middle years, spoken from the perspective of experience and lessons learned.  Is there a crisis?  Absolutely.  The crisis of realizing you’re literally on the backside of this life, and you aren't truly LIVING.  

About your host:
Dan Johansen is an author and poet who explores the joy and challenges found in seeking to live a more fulfilling life, with a view from the front row.  These musings are about discovering the beauty of living fully for yourself, and offering love, simply for the sake of the offering. 

Come along for the ride!  For more information, including links to my daily IG posts, books and more, go to www.danjohansen.com

title: InspirHere
description: Ever wondered if your life is headed where you want it to go? Join two women having organic, open conversations regarding the journey of evolution. What constitutes "self" and the "other?" Is happiness a process or destination? Can we truly ever eliminate bad habits? Get aligned with your core values, discover your vision and elevate your essence to the next level.

description: A través de la búsqueda en la obra de Cervantes "Don Quijote de la Mancha" de sentencias con una gran carga educativa, iremos adentrándonos en las enseñanzas universales de esta gran obra de la literatura universal.

description:

siamo semplicemente dei giovani che vogliono parlare liberamente di cosa ci passa per -la mente, senza troppi obblighi o vergogne.
Puntiamo a divertirci mentre registriamo, come se stessimo parlando con i nostri amici in una qualsiasi uscita.

title: De Kierkegaard Podcast

Hierbij sturen meelezers vragen in, die besproken worden door Lineke Buijs en Andries Visser. Wij gebruiken hierbij de eigen vertaling en inleiding, verschenen bij uitgeverij Boom. Bij elke aflevering wordt ook een gesprek opgenomen met een van de meelezende deelnemers, voor extra verdieping.

So, come on in and enjoy this discussion and join in too through comments and conversations with your own people around you.

description:
El pòdcast científic que posa sobre la taula algunes recerques científiques que canviaran la manera en com veiem el món. Un pòdcast que pretén fer reflexionar sobre les conseqüències que tindrien i l'impacte que causarien en la nostra vida les noves tècniques que es poden arribar a desenvolupar.

En aquestes gravacions es parlarà sobre la implantació de cèl·lules mare en el món de la reproducció assistida i les implicacions ètiques i morals que això comportaria, entrevistes amb professionals sobre les cèl·lules mare i molt més!

No et perdis ni un episodi del 'Game Changer' per estar al corrent d'algunes de les innovacions més pioneres en el món de la recerca científica.

title: PARADÓJICAMENTE
description: En este podcast vengo en patineta directo a arrollar sin misericordia las creencias pretenciosas que emanan sin mesura de las bocas del bípedo más famoso terrestre: el HUMANO. Pendulando en vano por la eternidad nuestra especie deja pasar, cual agua en manos, la realidad, vertiendo su enfoque entero en fantasías y onanismos efímeros, que han tomado de la sociedad desde tempranas edades. Mi voz será un portal de acceso desde el que podrás conocer una óptica distinta, despolarizada, de razonamiento multidimensional y experiencia atemporal. ¿ESTOY LOCO? Sólo un loco concibe la locura. Un amante el amor, un sabio la sabiduría... y un paradójico la paradoja.

title: Change your conception of yourself and you will automatically change the world in which you live.
description: “Chance or accident is not responsible for the things that happen to you, nor is predestined fate the author of your fortune or misfortune. Your mind impressions determine the conditions of your world. The mind is not selective; it is impersonal and no respecter of persons. The mind is not concerned with the truth or falsity of your feeling. It always accepts as true that which you feel to be true. Feeling is the assent of the mind to the truth of that which is declared to be true. Because of this quality of the subconscious there is nothing impossible to man. Whatever the mind of man can conceive and feel as true, the mind can and must objectify. Your feelings create the pattern from which your world is fashioned, and a change of feeling is a change of pattern.”

title: a girl with a joint.
description:
The podcast that takes its name literal. 

As an anthropologist, I study humans for a living. 
So here is where I integrate my studies to modern day topics and life experiences. Being raised in a carribean household by a single parent a lot of my personal experiences are based on widely normalized behaviors within the black community. Through my studies and detachment from "the norm" I've been able to debunk many ideologies that were heavily influencing how I was taught to perceived the world. 

Many of these episodes are based in having introspective conversations to assist in self discovery and I hope these topics strike a conversation to occur in your own lives as well.

title: Dear Jane
description: This podcast brings together pro-life leaders and individuals of all stripes to have meaningful conversations about the issue of life. How do we tackle the massive injustice of abortion while keeping the abortion-minded woman at the forefront of our considerations? How do we hold heartbreak, anger, and compassion close to our hearts to minister to everyone impacted by abortion? How do we work with others with whom we differ ideologically on every other issue except the issue of abortion to promote a culture of life? These are just some of the questions we wrestle with on our Dear Jane podcast. The other side only wants to highlight our differences, but we want to talk with people in the movement about what unites us. Dear Jane focuses on the one thing we can all agree on: the sanctity of every human life. Dear Jane will host the hard conversations, ask the tough questions, and acknowledge our differences while always keeping in mind our shared beliefs. Tune in to listen to heartfelt conversations and learn more about what your place in the pro-life movement may be!

description:
Welcome to our podcast!
Our mission here at Exploring the Iceberg is to cultivate a sense of groundedness and self-actualization, may it be through conversations in ancient Vedic wisdom and holistic science or the intricate mazes of human nature and psychology. 
We hope to take you deep into the world of the unseen to examine the iceberg of reality from both the murky depths of the ocean and the bright sunlit surface!
If you wish to accompany us on our journey into the unknown, follow us on any or all platforms!
With gratitude and love,
Jagan and Sophia

It is the logic, facts, and morals that are becoming an arsenal of weapons in this fight for truth and justice. This is coming from young people seeking the truth in order to ground our beliefs. So let’s reject the lie that young people should be sheep who can’t freely and intelligently think for ourselves, and let us seek truth to learn together what we believe and WHY we believe it.

title: Озарење
description:
Озарење може значити просвећење или просветљење, али и усрећити и образовати и развеселити, па чак и пријатно изненадити. 

У сваком случају, озарење претпоставља радосни сустрет у слободи љубави са другом личношћу, из којег сусрета исијава усхићење, блистање и спокојство. Зато је озарење увек везано за другог у односу на нас, тако други није наш пакао већ наше избављење из ове ”долине смрти” у којој се сви налазимо. Тако истинско озарење може доћи само из вечности, из нашег односа према вечном Богу. Стога је озарење и истинско божанско надахнуће, али и пробуђење и укрепљење, и спасење, и пробуђење, и откровење, и обасјање, али и усхођење па сам тим и подвиг узрастања у врлини односа према другом, па је озарење уједно и очовечење, али и усиновљење.

Озарење представља подвиг потраге за врлином љубави према другом, али истовремено и обасјање свих људских трагања вечном Истином. Зато без озарења нема истинске радости и среће. И управо сва наша трагања кроз друштва, економију, социјалне односе, уметност и све друге људске активности нису ништа друго до подвига или потраге за срећом. Питање је само да ли је подвиг усмерен на прави пут или не. 

Овај подкаст је само један мали део мог подвига, моје потраге за просвећењем и просветљењем у смиреноумљу.

title: Чакащи артисти
description: Един подкаст посветен на изкуството, културата и необикновения човек. ЧовекътПлюс - Артистът. С водещ Кристина Беломорска. В епизодите заедно с вас ще се потапяме в извънредния свят на изкуството, разговаряйки с онези артисти, които са си поставили свръхзадачата да създават, променят и вдъхновяват културния контекст на страната, а понякога и отвъд пределите ѝ. С тях освен за творчество им и условията, в които го създават, ще разсъждаваме, доколкото можем, над големите въпроси. Тези въпроси, които замъчват душата и не ѝ остават мира, които я държат будна, търсеща и очакваща. Ще говорим за големите проблеми и големите мечти. Свободно и без цензура, каквото и да ни струва това, и честно ще разкриваме истината за това на какво се надява и какво чака един артист. Подкастът "Чакащи артисти" е и рубрика част от радиопредаването на Дарик радио "Игрите на ума", с водещ Иван Кацаров и продуцент Даниела Александрова. Проектът е подкрепен и от НФК, по програма "Творчески стипендии 2022 г." Това е общ проект на предаването „Игрите на ума“ и Кристина Беломорска.

title: Stoic Spirituality
description:
Greetings and a warm welcome to the Stoic Spirituality Channel! My name is Jagan, and I'm a lifelong student of the human experience, eager to share the wisdom I've gained over the years. It is my sincerest hope that you find my content enjoyable and enlightening.

I aim to explore the many books I've devoured, both past and present, to offer insights and practical advice for all. Books are an invaluable source of knowledge because they represent the distilled wisdom of a lifetime of experiences, thoughts, and reflections. By reading, we can gain access to the hard-won insights of the greatest minds throughout history.

My approach will be to analyze each book in depth, highlighting the key points that have resonated with me. I believe that through a thoughtful examination of literature, we can deepen our understanding of the world and ourselves. So please join me on this journey of discovery, and I hope you'll find something here that speaks to you.

Hope you enjoy and if you like my content, drop me a follow and find me on Instagram @stoicspirituality and Tiktok @stoicspirituality,

I am also on Youtube @stoicspirituality

title: MAD CREATIVE with Leyden Lewis + Ed Lederman
description:
Mad Creative is an intimate platform created to be shared with individuals exploring and sharing their lives, processes, joys, and challenges. Our discussions include artists, comedians, painters, jugglers, print-makers, writers, animators, photographers, musicians, and those creatives we have yet to think about or yet discovered. Our guests reveal their passions and inspirations and what it takes them to live and thrive as a creative.

We know it’s not always an easy path. Let’s talk about it! We want to know what the essence of your creativity is and what keeps it alive in all dimensions both professionally and personally.

We hope you will join us in listening and hopefully participate in the madness as we journey into the minds of varying creative thoughts and modalities. We encourage you to email us if you want to share your story. You never know you just might be the next guest!

Ed Lederman is a professional photographer with 40 + years of experience. Ed’s signature eye has created a unique spin on architectural photography in and throughout NYC. As a Creative-Coach, Ed works with individuals to help them attain the next level in their own professional /life vision. Through disciplined practices, Ed shepherds his clients to “get them into their essences” and ultimately into a thriving career and life. The Standard Culture site is quoted as: “Photographer Ed Lederman is a lover of New York. Looking at his images is somewhat of a love letter to the city”

Leyden Lewis is an interior and architectural designer, producing works in Los Angeles, NYC, and East Africa. He is also a collector and an aficionado of art and design. A true multi-disciplinarian- his work includes a rigorous design and fine art practice working in high-end luxury interiors and buildings, drawing more recently discovered a new passion: writing. Leyden is a founding member of the Black Artists + Designers Guild (BADG) a not-for-profit organization with aims to expand the equity and visibility of black diasporic excellence in the art and design space.

The duo takes the raw intimate nature of the conversations they’ve shared over the years to their podcast Mad Creative. The conversations (not interviews) are unscripted and never know where they are going to land …….that’s what’s so exciting!

title: Everything is Wrong and I Would Like to Fix It.
description: Malath Kamaluldeen (creative technologist) puts everything that’s wrong with the world under the microscope to dissect, intellectualize, diagnose, and (hopefully) heal with bizarre solutions backed by research, community collaboration, and love. Issues discussed are larger than just me and you and will take years to heal BUT! I believe in the butterfly effect & the power of community, love, and research.

title: So Much Uncensored
description:
Welcome to "So Much Uncensored," the podcast where Samim and Maz (SM) dive headfirst into the uncharted waters of life's most profound questions and controversial topics. In each episode, they'll bring you candid conversations, unfiltered opinions, and a fresh perspective on the world around us.

These two friends have been debating and discussing everything under the sun for years, and now they've decided to share their unfiltered insights with the world.

Intrigued? You should be! Samim was once a devout follower of religion until he went through a transformative experience that led him to question everything he once believed in. Masoud, on the other hand, had always been a staunch atheist but has recently found himself drawn to spirituality in unexpected ways.

Together, they take you on a wild ride through life as they explore the meaning of existence, question reality, and come up with new frameworks to understand the world around them. From controversial topics to taboo subjects, nothing is off-limits in their unbridled discussions.

So buckle up and get ready to join SM on their adventure through life. This is one podcast you won't want to miss!

description: We're here to discuss all things interesting, deep, and even controversial. There is always something new to learn, and we have guests who can share great stories and discuss some great points. Here at Vanquish, we are interested in so many topics, from Philosophy to Psychology, and from History to Science. Our guests are interesting, and we allow them to provide value. Nothing is off limits, and the 'freedom of speech and ideas' is strongly encouraged. This podcast has a self-improvement undertone, and we as a show have a thirst for knowledge and understanding. We hope you have gained some value from listening to our show!

title: How We Doin Podcast
description:
How We Doin Productions is a movement. A movement that encourages the lives of others to think about their neighbor… To care and engage for their neighbor. With all the controversy that is going on in the world today, we are trying to be that positive force to remind people that together we could accomplish great things but divided; we could do nothing. That is what the history of humanity has shown, and that's what it will always be. We plan to push this movement through entertainment, interviews with influencers, and reflecting on trending topics to explore the true good that lies within all of us. How we doin' is a New York slang, especially in the streets of Brooklyn. It's common to say to those that you see on a day-to-day. But it is also the basis of care, compassion, and love. We will expand on the "how we doin" culture in our podcast, bringing people together and having fun while we're at it.

Visit howwedoinproductions.com

title: Emotional Education with Dr. Albert Levis
description: Albert Levis, M.D., the inventor of Moral Science, puts his approach into practice at his Museum of Creative Process in Vermont where he connects Formal Theory to the artistic process through exhibitions and workshops. A practicing psychiatrist for over forty years, Levis was trained at the Universities of Zurich and Geneva, the University of Chicago and Yale. In Emotional Education, Dr. Albert Levis discusses Emotional Education for all, the Moral Science Theory, and the Creative Process.

title: polyChromatique
description:
Reconnect and Resonate with The Eclectic Podcast that takes a Deep Look into Topics Involving: Life, Science, Psychology, Art, Humanity, and Curated/Popular Media. Unscripted, unfiltered, honest and authentic and occasionally for passion and/or comedy's sake - hyperbolic.

By discussing a wide-variety and range of topics, co-hosts Zach and Elaine take you on a listening discovery and learning-based journey that explore eclectic topics that expand our minds, deepen our hearts, with the goal of reconnecting us towards (com)passion for: life, interests, and one another. To instill and distill knowledge that is both experience and research-based, we delve into existential, philosophical and interesting conversations that probe into the deeper meaning and context of a given topic. We are happy to share this fun, weird and interesting experience that's never dry.

Moreover, this format also provides the opportunity for hosts and guests to connect on a deeper, but also relatable level, in the backdrop of an ever-increasingly disconnected and neurotic world. There are eventual plans to share this opportunity at voice with experts and listener's alike to distill such topics in detail. Your voice and expression matters!

Due to the passions/enthusiasm of our hosts, this podcast may contain some explicit language and occasional F*-bombs, but always refrain from being distasteful, or excessive in nature. It should be considered generally safe for most listening audiences.

This podcast is continually evolving, so we are open to suggestions and feedback.

title: GLOW2IT
description:
GLOW2IT is a podcast that dives into the many realms of professional development, communication, relationships, motivational speakers, comedians, and public figures, all to ensure that we shine our brightest and glow. It’s a pun that I thought was funny while driving; growing up – Shine Bright Like a Diamond – Brighter – Sun – Bright Learner – Glow Up – Lead Up – Lead to it – Glow2it! Phew, I finally got there! See a little comedy as well!

So, with that, we’re creating a podcast that enables the knowledge you seek to glow in your way and shares the benefits that help grow your mindset and how you communicate and develop the skills so you can burn to your brightest potential. 

Our goal is to cultivate a space of collective knowledge of professional development, mindfulness, resiliency, and communication skills that build you to be the brightest you can be!

Growing up, my parents always said, “… you have to grow up…” so that’s what I’m doing alongside some of my favorite professional development writers, public speakers, motivational storytellers, and many more because I know that I can’t shine my brightest if I haven’t grown up, if I haven’t Glow2it!

Explore a diverse range of perspectives as we hear from individuals from all walks of life, sharing their stories and lending us their shoes for a couple of hours. Discover the abundance of blessings we experience on this beautiful planet Earth.

No matter your background or status, we believe in the power of intuition and those 'Eureka' moments that light our way. Together, let's shed the illusion of differences and reconnect with our shared humanity.

title: Pisma i Znaki
description:
Co to znaczy istnieć, na czym polega wolność, od czego zależy nasze szczęście, wreszcie – jak ulepszać świat, korzystając z postępu nauki, sukcesów i porażek ludzi, którzy żyli przed nami? Pytania filozoficzne towarzyszą człowiekowi od wieków, także dziś. W audycji Pisma i znaki, razem z gośćmi, rozmawiamy o sprawach, które ciągle są aktualne. Nawiązujemy do historii filozofii, różnych sposobów myślenia o świecie i człowieku. Nie dajemy gotowych odpowiedzi na trudne pytania. Zachęcamy do krytycznego myślenia, twórczej refleksji.

title: When The Session Ends
description: Take a seat because here in this space, you will get to hear the tales of therapists when they are not in session. Two mental health counselors dive deep into how we think about the helping profession, clients, ourselves as clinicians, and various topics that cover everything from ethics to real client cases. With special guests and live Q & A, it is a novel and extremely exciting way for anyone (whether you're in the profession or not) to hear stories, facts and discussions that no one speaks openly about. We hope you will gain insight, be validated, get curious, or at the very least, laugh. Because when the session ends, laughter can sometimes be our only way to avoid complete burnout.

title: Stepping Out the Box
description:
"Stepping Out of the Box" is a dynamic and engaging podcast that covers a wide range of topics, including religion, world and local news, politics, sports, and life in general. Hosted by Uncle Daddy PopPop and Chuckee, this variety podcast takes listeners on a journey through various subjects, offering unique perspectives and insights along the way.

As Uncle Daddy PopPop likes to say, he's not just hosting the show by himself; his best friends God and Jesus are along for the ride too. With a deep commitment to faith and spirituality, the show often explores religious themes and offers thoughtful reflections on the role of religion in contemporary society.

But "Stepping Out of the Box" is more than just a religious podcast - it's a show that tackles a diverse range of issues and perspectives, always with a sense of humor and openness to new ideas. Whether you're interested in current events, sports, or just looking for some insightful commentary on the human experience, this podcast has something for everyone. So come join Uncle Daddy PopPop and his friends on this journey through life - you never know what you might learn along the way.

title: Legally Green
description:
We are Legally Green - the number one podcast on the current sustainability trends that shape the evolution of the law of the future.

Legally Green is a podcast of three law students - Rob, Hanna and Zuza - who explore together the influence of sustainability on the present and future of law, in the context of European Union, but taking into account the global trends.

The predominant aim of this podcast is to provide predictions based on the current sustainability trends shaping the evolution of the law and the law’s influence on our daily lives. The overarching question guiding our podcast is “how does sustainability influence the various fields of law?” and each of the episodes will be guided by the current developments in a different area of the law. Some of the topics you might expect to hear about are legal philosophy, transport, sustainable finance and more.
author_name: Zdzisław Robert Rypniewski, Zuzanna Węsierska, Hanna Kud

title: Here With Us
description:
"Welcome to 'Here With Us' - your gateway to the inexplicable mysteries of the universe. Prepare to embark on a journey into the hidden realms of the paranormal, where things aren't always what they seem, and the unexplained is just part of the daily conversation.

In each episode, we plunge into chilling accounts of the supernatural, tales of cryptid encounters, and unparalleled stories of Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) and Unidentified Flying Objects (UFOs). Every week, we strive to decipher the undecipherable, challenge the norms, and answer the unanswered with the help of experts, eyewitnesses, and enthusiasts from around the world.

But 'Here With Us' is more than just a podcast. It's a community for those who believe, those who question, and those who are just fascinated by the countless enigmas that surround us. It's a space where the strange is normal and the unknown is embraced. We are the seekers, the curious, the brave. This is not just our journey, it's yours too.

So dim the lights, put on your headphones, and step into a world where cryptids roam, phantoms whisper, and lights soar across the sky with unknown origins. Are you ready to question reality and explore the extraordinary? It's all right here with us."

title: The Trey Kelly Perspective
description:
"The Trey Kelly Perspective" is a dynamic podcast that offers three types of episodes, each focusing on a distinct aspect: a book passage analysis, thought-provoking content exploration, and engaging interviews with diverse guests.

"Book Passage Spotlight": In this episode, delve into the world of literature by analyzing and discussing a captivating passage from a book. Each week, explore different genres, authors, and themes, diving deep into the chosen passage's symbolism and significance.

"Content Chronicles": This episode explores important and applicable content beyond books. From insightful articles to thought-provoking videos, influential speeches, or inspiring stories, "Content Chronicles" covers a wide range of mediums and topics. Each week, discuss and analyze compelling content, highlighting its relevance, impact, and connection to current events or personal growth.

"The Interview Series": Experience captivating conversations with a diverse range of guests. From bestselling authors and experts in various fields to artists, activists, politicians, and inspiring individuals, this episode brings forth unique perspectives, insights, and stories. Each week, the episode features a different interview, allowing listeners to connect with remarkable individuals and gain valuable insights.

With "The Trey Kelly Perspective" listeners can enjoy a varied podcast experience that stimulates their intellectual curiosity, expands their knowledge, and introduces them to fascinating individuals. The podcast encourages engagement, reflection, and personal growth through the exploration of literature, thought-provoking content, and interviews with remarkable voices.

title: Higher Understanding
description:
Welcome to "Higher Understanding" with your host, Jack Gray. Join Jack on a transformative journey where he explores a wide array of topics that ignite curiosity, provoke contemplation, and inspire personal growth.

Disclaimer: Jack acknowledges the possibility of being fallible in his discussions. However, the essence of "Higher Understanding" lies in the pursuit of knowledge, fostering an environment where listeners are encouraged to think critically and arrive at their own conclusions.

In each episode, Jack fearlessly dives into subjects ranging from philosophy and spirituality to science and psychology. He delves into the depths of these topics, unraveling their complexities and shedding light on different perspectives. Through thought-provoking conversations and insightful monologues, Jack shares his own insights, experiences, and reflections, all while humbly acknowledging the potential for error.

The mission of "Higher Understanding" is to empower listeners to cultivate their own intellectual growth. By engaging with the content and embracing diverse viewpoints, you are invited to embark on a personal exploration of knowledge and wisdom. Jack's aim is to facilitate an open-minded and respectful space where listeners can challenge preconceptions, expand their horizons, and evolve their understanding of the world.

Your participation is vital to the podcast's vibrant community. Jack encourages you to share your thoughts, perspectives, and even disagreements. Engage in lively discussions with fellow listeners, connect with the host, and provide valuable feedback by writing reviews.

So, get ready to elevate your mind and embark on a quest for higher understanding. Tune in to "Higher Understanding" with Jack Gray and immerse yourself in an enlightening experience where knowledge is embraced, fallibility is acknowledged, and personal growth is nurtured. Join the conversation, challenge ideas, and together, let's reach new heights of understanding.

title: Seeking Mount Parnassus
description:
Astrologically-inspired conversations about philosophy, love, and how to be a wide-awake human in a dark age.

This podcast has no labels and no limits – we bring into it all of who we are and share our writings and conversations out of the simple motivation to express ourselves freely, and to come to our own understandings of all of the things that give meaning to our lives.

Our interests range from astrology, buddhism, and energy work to anarchism, skateboarding, horses, and poetry. We are writers, explorers, questioners, and instigators; we are also deep thinkers and deep feelers. Having grown tired of shallow, stupid, unoriginal conversations, we decided to open the door to our own inner world, and send out a beacon to any others trying to keep their flame alive in the darkness.

We invite you to join us on the path to Mount Parnassus. If we can meet there and bring our small flames together, we can blow on them and tend them together until they grow into a magnificent blaze.

www.seekingmountparnassus.com

title: Life, The Universe, and Dan
description:
I have always been naturally curious about life and the universe.

My parents nurtured and encouraged this curiosity, especially my father, who was an engineer with a keen understanding of physics. He loved explaining the mysteries of the cosmos to me, and one particular conversation turned my curiosity into a lifelong obsession with knowledge and learning.

After the death of my brother in 2018, my curiosity turned into a passion. As I dealt with my own experience of grief and pain, I became fascinated with life and death. I have since explored what it's been like to go through addiction, death, and divorce.

I have come to a place of acceptance and peace around not only my brother's death, but many of life's anxieties.

My curiosity now takes me on a journey to understand what it has been like for those around me to experience life and death.

In my podcast, I talk to friends and family about their lives and what it was like to lose our dear friend and brother, Dan. I explore many topics, including death and suicide.

I encourage you to listen with an open heart, but be prepared that the subject matter can be difficult at times. Go gently

title: The Truth About Us
description:
We live in this world according to who we believe we are, or whatever abilities we believe we possess. Whether we regard ourselves as helpless people who are ill equipped to deal with the challenges of life, or people who are fully able and confident enough to live up to the purpose of life, it all depends on who we think we are.

Every week, Goitsemang reveals the connection between the mind and the body in a relationship we regard as being human. He explains how they both work together, with the mind in charge, to create the things we experience every day. All this to emphasize our oneness with each other as people, and with the things we create.

My official website: oneppp.xyz - please check for all the other services I offer.

My book: “We Are God – The Power is Within Us” can be found on Amazon.com, in both paperback and kindle.

title: The Dream Chasers Podcast
description:
Dreams take on many forms. As a society, we often focus solely on the results of goal-setting an dream chasing and not the journey itself. Because of this, many folks are shy about talking about their Big Fat Dreams until they achieve them.

BUT what if we simply celebrate the journey TOWARDS the dream? The journey is often overlooked but can truly be the life-changing event... even more so that the realized dream.

In each episode, we will discuss a new dream, an old dream, a realized dream, or perhaps a dream that didn't turn out the way we expected.

Harlem by Langston Hughes

What happens to a dream deferred?

Does it dry up

like a raisin in the sun?

Or fester like a sore—

And then run?

Does it stink like rotten meat?

Or crust and sugar over—

like a syrupy sweet?

Maybe it just sags

like a heavy load.

Or does it explode?

So if you're ready, let's have a sip with me on our journey through Western Philosophy.

title: The Great American Fascion Show
description:
The future was stolen before most of us we were born.

It bled out on the floor of a Memphis hotel balcony,

And on the pantry floor of a bourgeois LA hotel in the spring and summer of '68

The bastards that took their lives ensured that the war in Vietnam would rage for another seven years.

They also ensured that the neglect of ghettos and reservations would continue unabated for another fifty years.

They killed our only palpable chance to end the war on drugs and the bipartisan mass incarceration of minorities for profit.

They paved the way for the bloodthirsty paranoia of tricky dick that would in its turn infest body politic for generations to come in true American "Fascion"

Our collective cognition was hijacked in broad daylight.

In the eyes of the corporate state we are worth no more than the weight of our meta data.

Privacy is dead and you are a bonafide commodity.

It wasn't always that way. But it's been that way for awhile.

With the premiere of "The Great American Fascion Show" we are set to expose the gnarled roots of corporate fascism.

For our first installment, we will present to you, The Ballad of Smedley Butler. Part 1.

title: White Rabbit Podcast
description:
Welcome to the White Rabbit Podcast with Katillist Jones

Step into the realm of the extraordinary with the White Rabbit Podcast, hosted by the enigmatic Katillist Jones. If you're a seeker of truth, a lover of the unexplained, and a connoisseur of all things conspiratorial, you've just landed in the right rabbit hole.

Join Katillist and a myriad of captivating guests as they dive deep into the mysteries that defy conventional understanding. From bestselling authors and daring podcast hosts to courageous whistleblowers and intrepid truth-seekers, the White Rabbit Podcast is your portal to the shadows where secrets dwell.

Are you a true believer in the bizarre? A skeptic with a taste for the uncanny? Then consider yourself one of the esteemed "conspiracy junkiez" – a community of like-minded individuals who refuse to accept the mundane as reality. As we explore the uncharted territories of the mind, each episode unveils new layers of intrigue and astonishment.

Our discussions span the spectrum of the enigmatic – from the elusive cryptids like Bigfoot and dogman that lurk in the twilight, to the heated debates surrounding the shape of our very planet. Whether you're delving into the darkest government cover-ups or unraveling the threads of ancient mysteries, the White Rabbit Podcast promises to keep you hooked, curious, and always hungry for the next revelation.

So, if you're ready to journey beyond the veil of the ordinary, to question, to explore, and to dare, tune in to the White Rabbit Podcast with Katillist Jones. The truth is out there, waiting to be uncovered, and with every episode, you're one step closer to deciphering the riddles that shape our world.

Join the Conspiracy Junkiez and dive down the rabbit hole.

title: Religious Artifacts
description: Religious Artifacts focuses on a healthy and loving conversation on various topics in different religious and social aspects in life. When it was originally thought of in 2018 by Juan Hartman, he had a purpose in mind to start spreading more positive love through healthy conversations after living such a violent and dissatisfying life. One of his biggest influences in this idea was his best friend and brother, CJ Kelly, who during a hard time in Juan’s life, was always there out of love and was always willing to speak and talk. Even though their religious ideas were not the same, they always were able to have a great conversation with a hug in the end. With this Juan realized that there is a potential to share a bond and brotherhood regardless the God(s) you follow or the religious life you live, as long as your moralities lined up and you were willing to converse and not argue in the end. With this idea, Religious Artifacts was born, a place where the idea of “Religion” is the “Artifact”, a place where relationships on human morality and love can be formed because we can all agree in the end that’s what wins. We hope to have fun discussions on the histories on all and any religious idea and bring each other together in conversation. Our goal in the end will always to be to give back with positivity and love. Look for us in the future to be starting our own Non-Profits to give back to those in the world that need it and spread that love.

title: The UAP Chronicle Speaks
description:
Step into the space where fantasy meets reality with "The UAP Chronicle Speaks," the official podcast of our UFO publication. Recorded live amidst the ambient hum of bars, coffeehouses, and clandestine locales, we delve deep into the enigmatic, the unexplained, and the profound. As we've often found, truth can be stranger than the most intricate fiction.

Beyond the core UFO phenomena, our conversations spiral out into the fringes, exploring realms that, while sometimes indirectly related, form the intricate tapestry of UFO culture. From the imaginative realms of writing and science fiction to the cutting-edge domains of AI and physics, from the philosophical depths to the shadowy corridors of the military-industrial complex and black ops budgets, we traverse it all.

These are not just tales of lights in the sky but a holistic exploration of a culture, a mystery, and the myriad ways it intersects with our world. Whether you're a skeptic, a believer, or someone who revels in the vastness of human imagination and experience, "The UAP Chronicle Speaks" is your gateway to the unknown. Tune in, ponder, and let our universe envelop you in its enigma.

title: Provocative Burst
description: Welcome to Provocative Burst, the podcast that delivers daily doses of thought-provoking questions in just one to two minutes. Something to start your morning off or to think about during those few dull moments in the day. Get ready to ignite your curiosity and spark meaningful conversations.

title: Reality Bytes
description: Welcome to RealityBytes, your window into the unfiltered stories of modern daily life. We're here to explore the intricate tapestry of human emotions – from triumphs and happiness to the shadows of greed, lust, treachery, and deceit. Join us for candid snapshots of these authentic experiences, revealing both the light and dark sides of our existence.

title: The Layman Podcast
description:
lay·man | (lā′mən) | (n.)

"A person without specialised or professional knowledge about a subject."

I started the podcast to talk to people and document what I learn from them. Everyone on the show is either a genuinely interesting person or a specialist in a particular field; either way there's something to be gained by hearing what they have to say.

title: Voces desde las intersecciones
description: La investigadora y académica de la Ibero, Michelle Gama conversa junto a Alejandro Anaya, Vicerrector de esta institución educativa sobre temas vinculados a los asuntos de género.
